Title: The Burrito
Writer: Michael Schur (created by), Megan Amram, Joe Mande, Kate Gersten (executive story editor), Cord Jefferson (story editor), Andrew Law (story editor), Daniel Schofield (story editor)
Actors: Kristen Bell, William Jackson Harper, Jameela Jamil, D'Arcy Carden
Plot: Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason consider how much they have (or haven't improved); Michael must deal with the consequences of his recent actions.
